name: Mega Maze 2022
description:
MegaMaze2022 is a game made in the style of finding a way out of a huge maze. The labyrinth contains over 300 rooms and many corridors. To make it easier for you to navigate, leave the doors open. Be careful, there may be another passage behind the open door. Turn on the flashlight by pressing the "F" key. Good luck finding a way out.

press F to turn on flashlight

press E to open the door
